articles.content:
Work of President Kim Il Sung Published in Italy 
    Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's famous work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was published in booklet by the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy on August 10.
 The work, brought out on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), clarified principled issues related to the unity of the whole nation to build a unified state, independent, peaceful and neutral.

articles.title: Declaration on 60th Anniv. of Korea's Liberation Published in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Plans to Deploy One More Air Force Unit in South Korea 
    Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are contemplating to deploy one home-based F-15E fighter squadron of the U.S. Air Force in south Korea, according to south Korean KBS.
 It will reportedly fly to south Korea next month to familiarize itself with the geographical features of the Korean peninsula and increase the capacity of flying missions in the event of contingency.    
 The U.S. imperialists recently worked out the new "operation plan 5027-04" and, to carry it into effect, are going through the motion of military "cutback" while steadily reinforcing their forces in south Korea with modern war tools and getting more feverish in the war moves.

articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit International Children's Camp 
    Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Esteban Lobaina Romero and embassy officials on August 18 visited the Songdowon International Children's Camp on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of the July 26 armed uprising of the Cuban people.
 They went round various facilities of the camp, being briefed on the camp well built as a comprehensive extracurricular education centre for schoolchildren thanks to the noble outlook of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the younger generation.    
 After going round the camp the ambassador wrote in the visitor's book that he was deeply impressed by the schoolchildren spending happy days at the wonderful camp. The Songdowon International Children's Camp shows well what warm loving care      Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il have shown to the children, he added.
